text: Quakertown is an unincorporated community in Harmony Township, Union County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== Quakertown was known as Millboro until 1866. A post office was established at Quakertown in 1866, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1903. ==Geography== Quakertown is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Union County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Quakertown, Indiana
